Types

FloatingGamepadTextInputMode {.pure.} = enum
  SingleLine = 0, MultipleLines, Email, Numeric
Source   Edit   
FriendFlags = enum
  FriendFlagNone = 0, FriendFlagBlocked = 1, FriendFlagFriendshipRequested = 2,
  FriendFlagImmediate = 4, FriendFlagClanMember = 8,
  FriendFlagOnGameServer = 16, FriendFlagRequestingFriendship = 128,
  FriendFlagRequestingInfo = 256, FriendFlagIgnored = 512,
  FriendFlagIgnoredFriend = 1024, FriendFlagChatMember = 4096,
  FriendFlagAll = 65535
Source   Edit   
GamepadTextInputLineMode {.pure.} = enum
  SingleLine = 0, MultipleLines
Source   Edit   
GamepadTextInputMode {.pure.} = enum
  Normal = 0, Password
Source   Edit   
NotificationPosition {.pure.} = enum
  TopLeft = 0, TopRight, BottomLeft, BottomRight
Source   Edit   
NumberOfCurrentPlayers = object
Source   Edit   
SteamAPICallFailure {.pure.} = enum
  None, SteamGone, NetworkFailure, InvalidHandle, MismatchedCallback
Source   Edit   
SteamAPIWarningMessageHook = proc (i: int; s: cstring)
Source   Edit   
SteamIPv6ConnectivityProtocol {.pure.} = enum
  Invalid = 0, HTTP, UDP
Source   Edit   
SteamIPv6ConnectivityState {.pure.} = enum
  Unknown = 0, Good, Bad
Source   Edit   
TextFilteringContext {.pure.} = enum
  Unknown = 0, GameContent, Chat, Name
